segments.text: I've finished my white clothes . I need to wash the rest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , when you do your darks , can you wash some of mine too ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can do that . Is there a special way you want them washed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They need to be washed on the gentle cycle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a lot of clothes that need to be washed ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There aren't many clothes , is your load big ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If it's a problem , you don't have to do it for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can do this for you . Don't worry .
segments.speaker: S2
